game.name: Tomo Jam
game.genres: 액션, 캐주얼, 인디, 시뮬레이션, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Remote Play Together, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Tomo Jam is a rhythm game where your controller becomes a real musical instrument. Play real MIDI songs solo or with up to four players, improvise freely, and add your own music to explore a deep, expressive sandbox built for creativity and fun.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Tomo Jam is a rhythm game where your controller becomes a real musical instrument. Play real MIDI songs solo or with up to four players, improvise freely, and add your own music to explore a deep, expressive sandbox built for creativity and fun.
